SELECT A.TOPWORK_NO , A.PRO_NO , A.TW_CATEGORY_NO , A.TOPWORK_CONTENT ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(A.TOPWORK_START,0,10)),'YYYY/MM/DD') AS TOPWORK_START ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(A.TOPWORK_END,0,10)),'YYYY/MM/DD') AS TOPWORK_END , A.TOPWORK_STATE , A.TOPWORK_IMPORTANCE , A.TOPWORK_PROGRESS , A.TOPWORK_LIKE , A.TOPWORK_FILE , A.TOPWORK_TITLE , B.TW_CATEGORY_COLOR FROM TOPWORK A LEFT JOIN TOPWORK_CATEGORY B ON A.TW_CATEGORY_NO = B.TW_CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN TOPWORK_RELATION C ON A.TOPWORK_NO = C.TOPWORK_NO WHERE A.TOPWORK_NO > 0 AND C.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND A.TOPWORK_DELETE = 'F' AND ROUND(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(TOPWORK_END,0,10))- SYSDATE) <= -1 and not a.TOPWORK_STATE = 4 ORDER BY a.TOPWORK_end ASC
